laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
in hiya illā asmāon sammaytumūhā antum waābāukum mā anzala al-lahu bihā min sul'ṭānin in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wamā tahwā al-anfusu walaqad jāahum min rabbihimu al-hudā
wakam min malakin fī al-samāwāti lā tugh'nī shafāʿatuhum shayan illā min baʿdi an yadhana al-lahu liman yashāu wayarḍā
inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati layusammūna al-malāikata tasmiyata al-unthā
wamā lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan
fa-aʿriḍ ʿan man tawallā ʿan dhik'rinā walam yurid illā al-ḥayata al-dun'yā
dhālika mablaghuhum mina al-ʿil'mi inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman ḍalla ʿan sabīlihi wahuwa aʿlamu bimani ih'tadā
walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi liyajziya alladhīna asāū bimā ʿamilū wayajziya alladhīna aḥsanū bil-ḥus'nā

alladhīna yajtanibūna kabāira al-ith'mi wal-fawāḥisha illā al-lamama inna rabbaka wāsiʿu al-maghfirati huwa aʿlamu bikum idh ansha-akum mina al-arḍi wa-idh antum ajinnatun fī buṭūni ummahātikum falā tuzakkū anfusakum huwa aʿlamu bimani ittaqā
am lam yunabba bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā
wa-an laysa lil'insāni illā mā saʿā
waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
